title: Stack Template Schema
description: Schema for defining a customizable stack template

name.description: The full name of the stack template.

shortNames.description: Alternative names or aliases for the template.

description.description: A brief explanation of what the template does or includes.

contentFolder.description: The folder where the template content is located.

features.description: A map of features available in this template. Keys are feature IDs (e.g., 'tailwind'), values define feature config.

name.description: The display name of the feature.

default.description: Whether this feature is enabled by default.
